cast.name: 阿历克斯·罗克 Alex Rocco

introduction: Two juvenile delinquents break into a luxury house where they rape two women. They settle in the house, sell the valuables and kill a curious neighbour.Fleeing the Florida police, two biker gang members end up in California looking for food and a place to live. When they come across a secluded mansion with two women at the pool, they decide to crash the house, terrorize the women, and make-off with all the valuables. However, the bikers are in...  Fleeing the Florida police, two biker gang members end up in California looking for food and a place to live. When they come across a secluded mansion with two women at the pool, they decide to crash the house, terrorize the women, and make-off with all the valuables. However, the bikers are in for the surprise of their lives when the tables are turned on them!
